name: df-ms
body: |- wceq(cms, crab(s0, cxms, wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ MetSp = { s0 ∈ *MetSp |((dist ` s0)|`((Base ` s0)×(Base ` s0)))∈(Met `(Base ` s0))}
comment: Define the (proper) class of metric spaces. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2006.)
